subject: PE Today: Soldiers Vs. Imus
body:
CBSNews.com












In 
      Imus Controversy, Stories Of Soldiers Forgotten "somebody please tell me why 
      that one incident, which caused no bleeding or dying, is getting more 
      radio air time than the fact that MY little buddy - along with about 
      100,000 of her closest friends and colleagues - has just been told she has 
      to spend three extra months in a combat zone."[+ Read More]

From 
      The Vault: "The Other Face Of Dixie"Check out "The Other 
      Face Of Dixie," a "CBS Reports" feature hosted by Harry Reasoner. The piece, which aired on 
      October 24, 1962, looks at race relations in the south, using school 
      integration as a jumping off point. [+ Read More]

The 
      Madrassa Rumor ReturnsLiberal media watchdog group Media 
      Matters has posted a complaint about Wednesday's installment of "Katie 
      Couric's Notebook," which centers on Barack Obama's background.[+ Read More]
